newsitem.title: USA: Informix has 500-600 in server trials.
newsitem.headline: Informix has 500-600 in server trials.

text.p: Informix Software Inc CEO Phil White said the company already has 500 to 600 customers in pilot trials of its new Universal Server, which it launched in late 1996.
White told Reuters after a panel discussion at a Hambrecht & Quist investment conference that the trials of its latest object relational technology are underway.

The Universal Server integrates the database technology of Illustra Technologies, which it acquired in late 1995, adding DataBlade software modules that enable customers to process multimedia content.
